T02D3609:233b-1: badzra b'a r'a hy'a ba shya bi dhi:/
T02D3609:233b-3: rdo rje phag mo'i dbang du bya ba'i cho ga / rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3609:233b-4: sems can rnams dbang du bya ba 'phags pa'i bden
T02D3609:233b-5: pa bzhi la gzhug nas dbang gi cho ga brjod
T02D3609:233b-6: par bya ste / de nas sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D3609:233b-7: rim pas bcom ldan 'das ma mchog tu dmar ba
T02D3609:233b-8: rdzogs par bskyed nas sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs
T02D3609:233b-9: su gyur pa las sku mdog dmar mo rnam par
T02D3609:233b-10: bsgoms nas yang dag par mchod pa dang bstod pa
T02D3609:233b-11: par bya ste / bya'o // mi bskyod rdo rje
T02D3609:233b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa
T02D3609:233b-13: rnams kyis de nyid gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3609:233b-14: kha thur du bstan pa'i thod pa gsum gyi steng
T02D3609:233b-15: du aa yig dmar po las byung ba'i padma'i snod
T02D3609:233b-16: du dam tshig bcu dang dbyangs yig bcu drug la
T02D3609:233b-17: sogs pa gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhis byin gyis
T02D3609:233b-19: 'og tu yam dang ram yig yongs su gyur pa
T02D3609:233b-20: las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor dag gis 'bar ba
T02D3609:233b-21: dang bsreg pa dag byas nas nye bar yang dag
T02D3609:233b-22: par bkod pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bskul
T02D3609:233b-23: nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams gdan drangs nas
T02D3609:233b-24: de la nang du byas te /
T02D3609:234a-0: dbyangs yig dang po las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng @234a * //
T02D3609:234a-1: du h'um yig las skyes pa zla ba la gnas
T02D3609:234a-2: pa des byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje dkar po
T02D3609:234a-3: rtse lnga pa 'phro bzhin pa'i 'od zer gyi dra
T02D3609:234a-4: bas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang zla ba'i rdo
T02D3609:234a-6: nye bar smin pa dang the tshom la sogs pa'i
T02D3609:234a-7: skyon du gyur na de'i steng du aom yig bsams
T02D3609:234a-8: nas de'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D3609:234a-9: bdud rtsi'i gzugs su gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D3609:234a-10: sna tshogs pa na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi rnams kyang
T02D3609:234a-11: de la rab tu zhugs shing aom yig kyang zhugs
T02D3609:234a-12: te / ji lta ba bzhin yongs su grub pa'i
T02D3609:234a-13: bdud rtsir bltas nas lan gsum de nyid gsum gyis
T02D3609:234a-14: brlabs nas cho ga bzhin du bdud rtsi myang ba
T02D3609:234a-16: ji srid 'dod kyi bar bsgoms nas rang gi ming
T02D3609:234a-17: gi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las bsgrub bya
T02D3609:234a-18: mdun du 'khor bar bltas shing de la sngags kyi
T02D3609:234a-19: phreng ba las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis de
T02D3609:234a-20: la bkug nas de la mang du bsgom par bya
T02D3609:234a-21: ste / de'i sems kyi rnam pa yongs su gyur
T02D3609:234a-22: pa las kun nas dmar pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3609:234a-23: gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3609:234a-24: sngags kyi phreng ba las lha mo sku mdog dmar
T02D3609:234a-25: mo phyag g-yon pas hr'i:yig gi zhags pa bsnams pa
T02D3609:234a-26: / phyag g-yas pas autpa la dmar po kha bye
T02D3609:234a-27: ba rdo rje'i lcags kyu lta bu bsnams pa bsgrub
T02D3609:234a-28: bya'i mdun du 'gro bar bltas te /
T02D3609:234a-30: aa mu ka sya tsitta m'a karsha ya h'um dza:zhes
T02D3609:234a-31: pas de la rnal 'byor pas bka' bsgo bar bya'o
T02D3609:234a-32: // de nas lha mo de cho ga bzhin du
T02D3609:234a-33: rab tu gzhug par bya bas zhags pas yang dag
T02D3609:234a-34: par bcings shing lcags kyus bskul zhing ji lta ba
T02D3609:234a-35: bzhin du bkug nas rang gi sems la rab tu
T02D3609:234a-36: // gzhug par bya'o // lha mo ni sngags kyi nang du blta bar bya'o //
T02D3609:234a-37: de nas de skra grol zhing rnam par myos shing
T02D3609:234a-38: 'dod pas myos par 'dod pas gcig pu dbang du
T02D3609:234a-39: gyur te lag pa thal mo sbyar nas sgrub pa
T02D3609:234a-40: po la gdong mngon par phyogs te mngag gzhug byed
T02D3609:234a-41: par 'gyur ro // rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3609:234a-43: // / phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba'i rdo rje
T02D3609:234a-44: phag mo lte ba'i phyogs su gri gug dang thong
T02D3609:234a-45: pa bsnams shing gar mdzad pa bsgoms na dbang du
